chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the following issue:
Hello. I've received the order, but it's missing the screen protector. Best regards.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

The customer received his device with scratches, and we offered to pay him €60 to keep it.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Nabilat-Adebeji Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Do let us know when you have processed the 60 euros, thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello ERIC, you will find the prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that suits you best to ship your package. You will find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. Preparation for return: 1. View instructions for returning an article here. 2. Add all accessories provided with your article 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Package your article and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging of the article: • The box must be solid and rigid. Place your article in a stable position so it does not move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label is damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before shipping. This will protect you in case of any issues during transport. Your return is ready to ship! We'll let you know when it arrives. We remain at your disposal, Customer Service Back Market, Customer Service Back Market

Hi ecomobile,

The customer accepts the gesture of €60.

Please proceed as soon as possible.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Nabilat-Adebeji Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the commercial gesture.
Thank you.

Regards,
KW
